entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Albany
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:29 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -30.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Moosonee Airport 03:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -30.7°C
Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -43
Dewpoint: -33.8°C
Wind: SSW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
